title: Crosse My Hart
description: Love doesn’t happen for everyone. He knew early on it wasn’t meant for him. His family’s curse has made sure of that. Hart Garcia is considered a modern-day kingmaker and he’s earned his place at the top. As the youngest established publicist in New York City, his is the name on everyone’s lips to work with. However, he’s about to face the biggest challenge of his career in his newest client and one uncanny job proposal.With drop-dead gorgeous looks, charisma, and an unmatched political pedigree, Liam Crosse is a true American prince. After disappearing from the world, he returns to pursue his family’s legacy at all costs. Even if that means finally settling down with a wife. And there’s only one man who can help him… the one he’s just kissed. Crosse My Hart is a high steam contemporary MM romance. It involves two strong-willed men navigating through the world with their family’s legacies on their shoulders. Their personalities will collide and they’ll push each other’s buttons. As time passes, they’ll soon find they have more in common than either ever expected. Their newfound friendship will propel their lingering attraction to one another and create a rift that’ll question everything they’re both working towards.
author: Julian Gaspay
